CHAT.comment: GEORGE DUNCAN, SUPERINTENDENT, GREAT MEADOW CORRECTIONAL FACILITY, Petitioner v. SHERMAN WALKER.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States as 11:05 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF PREETA D. BANSAL ON BEHALF OF PETITIONER
ORAL ARGUMENT OF DEBORAH W. LOEWENBERG ON BEHALF OF RESPONDENT
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF PREETA D. BANSAL ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
(Whereupon at 11:44 a.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
